alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 27 at 8:30PM CDT until October 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... East central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 830 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Olustee to 3 miles west of Odell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Olustee, Elmer, Fargo, Humphreys, Odell and Hess. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
